input.sentences: the art at the exhibit was cool .
some of i i could not tell what it was .
other things just seemed thrown together .
i took a picture of a vase i liked and headed out .
output.sentences: The exhibit had some really cool art sculptures and paintings.
They were very unusual and strange.
The orange sculpture looked like a tree branch with prickly balls.
One sculpture looked like it was thrown onto the painting behind it.
The vase was really different looking and the picture behind it was a weird headed man.
